description: When hot and hungry twenty-something Anna Tyler brings home her aggressive Tinder date Xander Corvus, Anna's over protective roommate, Charlotte Cross, gets up in Xander's face and throws him out. But the next morning, Charlotte discovers Anna is missing. Charlotte searches for her friend, but she is lured and trapped by Xander who reunites the terrified girls in a web of sexual degradation and domination.
title: Tinder Nightmare
